message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product that has been thoroughly tested and refined. I'm confident that you'll love it. The price of $1000000 is a steal for a product of this caliber. I'm willing to offer it to you at this price because I'm sure you'll appreciate its value.
Thank you for your confidence in the product. I believe in its value and am excited to make this purchase.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! As for this one, I want to emphasize that it's a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to a select few. The price of $1000000 is still a great value considering its exceptional quality and rarity. I'm willing to give you a chance to own it, but I need to know that you're committed to its value. Are you ready to take the next step and make this investment?

While I appreciate the uniqueness and rarity of the product, based on my experience with the last purchase, I need more information or a clearer indication of its value before committing to such a high price. Thank you for offering me this opportunity.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm happy to provide more information about this product. In fact, I have a special report prepared by a leading expert in the field, which highlights its exceptional features and benefits. The report is worth $50000 on its own, but I'll include it with the product if you decide to purchase it. Additionally, I'm willing to offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not completely satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. The price remains at $1000000, but I believe the added value of the report and the guarantee make it an even more attractive opportunity.
